name: Conveyor
description:
There is always the one who doesn’t fit. No matter where: in the perfect landscape, loving family - or jelly factory. The one who seeks freedom from the only one life they have.

“Conveyor” is a 3D-puzzle game about brave jello that is trying to escape from the factory. Move between conveyors and interact with buttons to find the way to the exit. However, this factory is a bit mysterious - who knows, where the next exit is going to be…

Controls:
A and D to move 
Space or W to jump 
E or S to press button

Created for The GMTK Game Jam 2019 by:

  • blednaya (https://blednaya.itch.io/)
  • ViktorWii (https://viktorwii.itch.io/)
  • Michael (https://mrrohngwald.itch.io/)
  • Nemesium (https://nemesium.itch.io/)
  • AnnikiForsi (https://annikiforsi.itch.io/)
